page.title: 11BASILDON NE: RECREATION
page.content:
We are ten years old. We asked our mates in school to find out what their mums and dads did after work.
Some of them go up the pubs for a drink, or if where they work has got a club, they go up there when the children can go too. Some of the dads belong to football clubs, and some of the mums belong to keep-fit clubs. A couple of the dads have interesting hobbies like making models of cars and things, or making and icing cakes. The mums don't seem to have time for hobbies. If the weather is fine some might go for a walk down to Northlands Park. At the weekends if there isn't shift work they might go for a drive somewhere.
But a lot are too tired to do anything except watch television or sleep.
